desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.gl:
4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Self: 3 turns Dalmasca's Valiant
Becomes Flame Purge+ while HP is at least 50% of MAX
desc.jp:
4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
自身に3ACTION「ダルマスカの勇将」付与
自身のHPが最大HPの50％以上の時
「百鬼・烈日の破邪＋」に変化

desc.gl: Dalmasca's Valiant: Raises party's MAX BRV, ATK (does not stack)
desc.jp: ダルマスカの勇将：味方全員の最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇する（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.gl:
4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Moderately restores own HP based on cumulative HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 30% of own MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Self: 6 turns Dalmasca's Valiant
Becomes Flame Purge+ while HP is at least 50% of MAX

desc.gl: Dalmasca's Valiant: Raises party's MAX BRV, ATK (does not stack)
desc.jp: ダルマスカの勇将：味方全員の最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇する（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.gl:
2-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt
All targets: 2 turns Lock
Self: 3 turns Kingdom's Shield, HP Damage Resist
(Up to 1 Kingdom's Shield may be simultaneously active in a party, with the newest effect taking precedence)
desc.jp:
2HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
与えたHPダメージの10％分
自身のBRVをアップさせる
対象に2ACTION「ターゲット固定」付与
自身に3ACTION「王国の盾」「HPダメージ軽減」付与
（「王国の盾」が付与できるのはパーティに同時に1つまでで
一番新しいもの以外は解除される）

desc.gl: Kingdom's Shield: Reduces BRV damage taken; group HP attacks hit self in place of allies
desc.jp: 王国の盾：被BRVダメージを軽減し 全体HP攻撃による味方へのHPダメージを自身が受ける

desc.gl: Lock: Unable to switch target
desc.jp: ターゲット固定：ターゲットが変更不能になる

desc.gl: HP Damage Resist: Reduces HP damage taken
desc.jp: HPダメージ軽減：被HPダメージを軽減する

desc.gl:
2-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt
All targets: 3 turns Lock
Self: 4 turns Kingdom's Shield, HP Damage Resist
(Up to 1 Kingdom's Shield may be simultaneously active in a party, with the newest effect taking precedence)
desc.jp:
2HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ

short_desc.jp: 闇と暗黒の衝撃パワー：「闇と暗黒の衝撃」のBRVダメージがアップ

desc.gl: With active Kingdom's Shield:\n • Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1 while own HP is at least 50% of MAX
desc.jp:
自身に「王国の盾」が付与されている時
自身のHPが最大HPの50％以上の時
敵の攻撃でHPダメージを受けても
必ず1残る

short_desc.gl: Steadfast Loyalty: Prevents HP from dropping below 1 with sufficient HP
short_desc.jp: 揺るがぬ忠誠心：HPが一定量以上の時 HPダメージを受けても必ず1残る

desc.gl: Slightly raises SPD with active buff

When using Fulminating Darkness:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage

desc.gl:
When using Ruin Impendent:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While Knight's Aptitude active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of own MAX HP)
